title: Lovely Wife for the Taking - Novel Updates
author: Southern Hue Year   南色流年
description:
Drugged, Xia Yanxi was meant to be given away to another man. However, she chose another option. She wanted no more than to live peacefully and become an actress. However, a night with Qiao Yanli changed the course of her life. Her own family discarded her and if that’s not already the worse, they would go out of their way to drag her into the mud.

What could Qiao Yanli do? Who is the sophisticated, elegant, Adonis of a man?

“Mrs. Qiao, my sweet lovely wife… This husband of yours will always be there for you. Whoever tries to wrong you, shall face my unforgiving wrath.”>
